==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Marette:''' Hmm... Oh! Hello. Can I help you with something?
:{{DIcon}} Hello.
::'''Marette:''' Oh, it's you. I remember you, and your little friend as well. You're the ones the [[Neuvillette|Iudex]] personally had escorted over here. You don't see that every day.
:;(Before completing Step 4 of ''[[Deluge of Wrathful Waters]]'')
:::'''Marette:''' Okay... Your registration information is all squared away. Try not to make any waves until you complete your sentence, okay?
:;(After completing Step 4 of ''[[Deluge of Wrathful Waters]]'')
:::'''Marette:''' Let's see here... Your files have been updated. Congratulations, consider your sentence officially served. You're free to go back to a place where the sun shines brightly and live your life as you see fit.
:{{DIcon}} Sorry to bother you.
::'''Marette:''' Have... *yawn*... Have a nice day...
{{Dialogue End}}
